meanings.definition: Covered in or full of nettles.
meanings.sent1: The nettliest bush in the garden stung me.
meanings.sent2: The nettliest patch of grass made it hard to walk through the field.
meanings.sent3: I learned the hard way that the nettliest area of the park was best avoided.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like the nettliest thorns, piercing through my defenses.
meanings.sent5: The nettliest part of the forest was a painful reminder of nature's prickly side.

meanings.sent1: The nettliest plant in the garden had the most stingers.
meanings.sent2: She carefully avoided the nettliest areas of the field to prevent getting stung.
meanings.sent3: The nettliest spot in the yard seemed to attract all the bees.
meanings.sent4: His jokes were the nettliest, always leaving a sting behind.
meanings.sent5: The nettliest corner of the garden was a buzzing hive of activity.

meanings.definition: Most difficult to deal with or navigate.
meanings.sent1: The nettliest situation at work required careful handling.
meanings.sent2: Navigating through the nettliest part of the maze was a real challenge.
meanings.sent3: Dealing with the nettliest customer of the day tested my patience.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were the nettliest maze, hard to untangle.
meanings.sent5: The nettliest path through the forest was a true test of endurance.
